text: James Patrick Otis (March 16, 1948 â€“ March 3, 2020) was an American actor. He was born in Stamford, Connecticut. Otis began his career in the 1970s. His first movie role was in Dragonfly. On television, he was known for his role in Profiler. In 1999, Otis appeared in three episodes of Star Trek: Deep Space Nine. In 2006, Otis appeared in the true story movie The Black Dahlia. Otis also appeared in The Prestige. Otis died in Stamford on March 3, 2020 at the age of 71. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from New York City Category:1948 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Actors from Stamford, Connecticut
title: James Otis (actor)
